DOC.brief_summary: Our study is to investigate the effect of N-3 Fatty Acids for the prevention of atrial fibrillation in patients with acute heart failure or acute myocardial infarction
DOC.brief_title: N-3 Fatty Acids for the Prevention of Atrial Fibrillation in Patients With Acute Heart Failure
DOC.criteria: sinus rhythm patients with acute heart failure or acute myocardial infarction pregnancy,allergy to epadel
